definition: square foot (unit of area equal to 0.093 m²)
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]

sentences.english: A: The monthly rental fee is twenty-eight Hong Kong dollars per square foot.
sentences.chinese: 每月租金是每平方英尺港幣二十八元。

sentences.english: The average rate for the second floor is two hundred Hong Kong dollars per square foot.
sentences.chinese: 第二層的平均租金是每平方英尺港幣二百元。

sentences.english: Four beds, four baths, all ensuite, just over three thousand square feet.
sentences.chinese: 一套面積爲三千平方英尺的四居四衛公寓？

sentences.english: The unit size is one hundred and twenty square feet. The net size is one hundred and twenty square feet.
sentences.chinese: 這個鋪位的建築面積約一百二十平方英尺。

sentences.english: Sonic booms are measured in pounds per square foot of overpressure.
sentences.chinese: 音爆是以每平方英尺的超壓磅數來測量的。

sentences.english: These tiles cost $291 per square foot.
sentences.chinese: 這些瓷磚每平方英尺的價格爲291美元。

sentences.english: The design included 528 stories, with a gross area of 18.46 million square feet.
sentences.chinese: 這個設計有528層，總面積爲1846萬平方英尺。

sentences.english: The net size is one hundred and twenty square feet.
sentences.chinese: 使用面積約八十平方英尺，這個鋪位還沒租出。

sentences.english: A ping is equal to about 36 square feet.
The net area is about eight hundred square feet.
sentences.chinese: 實用面積約八百平方英尺。

sentences.english: Prices have been slashed from $95 per square foot to $55.
sentences.chinese: 房價已經從95美元每平方英尺降到了55美元。

sentences.english: C: Around five hundred square feet.
Acceptable Benzene level indoors is 50 mg per sq. ft.
sentences.chinese: 正常室內可允許的苯含量爲每平方英尺50毫克。

sentences.english: I am looking for an apartment of around one thousand square feet for my family.
sentences.chinese: 我想找一個約一千平方英尺的住宅公寓給我的家人住。

sentences.english: A:The rental fee is two hundred and fifty Hong Kong dollars per square foot.
sentences.chinese: 租金是每平方英尺港幣二百五十元。

sentences.english: The gross area is approximately thirteen thousand square feet.
sentences.chinese: 建築面積約一萬三千平方英尺。

definition: square (as in square foot, square mile, square root)
foot (unit of length equal to 0.3048 m)
area (of a floor, piece of land etc)/surface area/tract of land
mile (unit of length equal to 1.609 km)
